snippet: A global commission is challenging the widespread belief that efforts to reduce global warming would carry a steep price.
abstract: Global Commission on the Economy and Climate will announce its findings that ambitious series of measures to limit carbon emissions will cost $4 trillion or so over next 15 years, increase of roughly 5 percent over amount that would be spent anyway; findings challenge widespread belief that efforts to address global warming would necessarily be costly.
lead_paragraph: A global commission is challenging the widespread belief that efforts to reduce global warming would carry a steep price.
